content: this easy and quick pattern was written for the red scarf project it comes in two versions **red scarf** chunky gauge 8 single_crochet/4 inches 400-432 yards size n hook finished dimension is 70 inches x 4 inches **green scarf** two-ply variegated hand spun 11 single_crochet/4 inches 450 yards size j hook finished dimension is 76 inches x 5 inches please see the red scarf project 1 for details on how to donate a scarf 1 http //orphan org/index php id=40
